com.yazdankhah.util

Class GenUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yazdankhah.util.GenUtil

  • public class GenUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Description: this class provides some string handling operations that Java does not support directly. Author: Ahmad Yazdankhah

      • findSmallestMultiple

        public static int findSmallestMultiple(int dividend,
                                       int divisor)
        find the smallest number greater than b which is a multiple of a. for example 5/2 = 2.5 then we round 2.5 upward to get 3 and 3 * 2 = 6 and return 6
        Parameters:
        dividend - - the dividend
        divisor - - the divisor
        Returns:
        the smallest multiple of the divisor greater than dividend
